1. #  **Acknowledgment:**

Dear *Client Name*, Thank you for considering Satva Solutions for your business requirements for *Project Name*

2. #  **Requirement Discussed:** 

*     

 

3. #  **Solution Suggested:**

* 

4. #  **Development Flow:**

* Kickoff meeting to discuss requirements with Satva’s development team, including hosting and deployment expectations.   
* As per the proposed flow, the configurations will be done   
* Satva’s development will be done as per the sprint plan  
* Once the first sprint is completed, PM will plan an internal demo  
* Internal Demo with Satva team with various stakeholders ( BA, TA & TL, Dev, QA)  
* Staging Deployment & Release on Client’s staging \- as per the agreement   
* Staging Demo with Client (Q\&A session)  
* Accept the minor changes and release the updated patch on staging  
* Bug Fixing \- from the UAT phase  
* UAT  Sign-off by Client's Team  
* Production Deployment \- as per the agreement   
* Support and Maintenance \- as per the agreement   
* Go Live


5. #  **Assumptions/Constraints:**

*   
    
    
  


6. #  **Next Steps:**

   

* Client needs to review the Requirements, Scope, and clarify assumptions  
    
* If required, request changes in scope or requirements as of now  
    
*  In such cases, the Satva team will provide a new ballpark estimate  
    
* If all makes sense, then kindly provide written approval  
    
* After approval, the Pre-sales team will initiate the internal project kick-off meeting with the development team for knowledge transfers  
    
* The development team will analyse the details shared by the pre-sales team and prepare questions for the client   
    
* The Project Manager will introduce the Development team to Basecamp and schedule an external project kickoff with the Client.
